A new day in Konoha, Naruto woke up and started getting ready to go out.
While eating his breakfast he recalls what happened yesterday.

He was on a mission of retrieving very important stolen documents from Konoha. His team (the 7° Team) found the guy who stole the documents, and they chase him.
—You won't get away with those! Everyone follow me I have an idea— Naruto yelled while throwing himself off against the thief.
The thief easily dodged the attack and kept running.
—Oh no, you won't! Shadow Clones Jutsu!— Naruto shouted and the clones appeared and they started chasing the thief.
—Naruto, don't be so reckless, He is a very clever ninja, try to analize his moves and we will catch him sooner or later— Kakashi said.
—He's right Naruto even with all those clones you won't be able to catch him if you don't think about the situation— Sakura replied.
—Your such an idiot, Naruto— Sasuke without regret told him.
—If your such a genius why you haven't come up with an idea eh? Sasuke!— Angry he answered.
—I have just come up with it just follow me— And Sasuke explained his plan and everyone followed him.

They quickly followed the plan and the thief was quickly captured.
—Good job everyone, especially you Sasuke, great plan— Kakashi said while congratulating Sasuke.
—I would have catched him earlier if you guys would followed me with my plan— Naruto replied to everyone.
—Even if it was the most awesome plan of the world, I would never followed you, Naruto— Sakura said.
—Yeah, me neither— Sasuke said.
—Sorry Naruto but unless you change your being you won't have any followers— Kakashi replied to him.
—You will see when I become Hokage, but until that I will come up with an idea to have followers who will obey me— Naruto said to everyone.

The mission was a success and Kakashi told his team all about this mission
—This guy stole many important documents and one of those was the Scroll of Seals fulled with forbidden jutsus, the same one that Naruto stole to learn the Shadow Clone Jutsu— Kakashi explained.
—Wow! If Naruto could stole this scroll I believe everyone in the world could steal it too, isn't there suppose to be security with the important documents, Kakashi-sensei?— Sakura questioned.
Naruto frowned but didn't say anything.
—Well it is because these documents are on the Hokage's place but Tsunade was drunk at the moment and they were easily stolen— Kakashi responded.
—I see— Sakura said.
—Well enough of this, let's get back to Konoha— Kakashi said and they were on the way to Konoha.
They arrived to Konoha. Luckily this was the last team's mission of the month and they have all the weekend to relax, but before that...
—Naruto, why you don't returned this documents to Tsunade tommorrow, it is already very late and your house is the closest one— Kakashi asked nicely to Naruto.
—Ok Kakashi-sensei, I'll do it— Naruto responded exhausted.
—See Naruto this is one lesson for you, If you ask the things nicely the people will do what you ask— Kakashi said.
Naruto look up to Kakashi's face and he watched a smile. Then, Naruto smiled too and everyone went to their own houses.


What a really long recall, but a nice history.


Naruto got ready to go out and to returned the important documents to Tsunade.
He picked up the documents when the Scroll of Seals drop off the bag and opened on a really peculiar jutsu (The hypnosis jutsu).
He peeked on the jutsu and saw a description: "with this jutsu anyone will obey you".
—Wow! what a really cool jutsu— Naruto was amazed and started reading it.

This Jutsu works like this:
1.Hand signals in front of someone and they enter in hypnosis mode.
2.Once in hypnosis mode they will follow any command you say.
3.Once you say your commands you can wake them to start the fun or start the fun in hypnosis mode.

Naruto quickly (but surprisingly) learned the jutsu and he wanted to test it.
—I have many options; maybe teasing some girls or revenge on Sasuke, Nah!, I prefer the girls— Naruto asked to himself.

With which girl we will start?

info.brief_description: The story of Naruto's new Jutsu
info.description:
Originally created by OJAVIX;

The story was erased from the face of the planet. Who knows what happened to either him, or his story? Not to worry, as I shall do my best with the resources I have to recreate the story so that no one will have lost their writings for it...for the most part.

Here were OJAVIX's previous rules:
The story is about the new jutsu that Naruto found (The Hypnosis Jutsu).

Keep in mind that you have to use Naruto characters and to make it on Naruto's plot.

This occurs during 1° Part of Naruto before Sasuke's leaving and Tsunade as hokage.

This Jutsu works like this:
1.Hand signals in front of someone and they enter in hypnosis mode.
2.Once in hypnosis mode they will follow any command you say.
3.Once you say your commands you can wake them to start the fun or start the fun in hypnosis mode.

This story is 18+ be aware that this story will have sex scenes and more possible offensive ones.

RULES:
-Everything is acceptable, (even gay stuff, but preferably not) lesbianic stuff OK.
-I'm seeing if making all stories 10 chapters long will be a good idea. With a happy ending or bad ending depending on your choices along the story. If this works, you can even kill characters but preferably at the end of a story.


And have fun!

200 points for anyone continuing to make chapters here.

If anyone has pages from the original story, please let send them to me and I will try to incorporate it into the story.

Naruto and all related characters copyright their original works.
